Text:
I'm really confused as to how to play the game on the wii.  Formerly I was using WBFS Manager to load iso's onto memory cards, then using neogamma to load the .iso from my wbfs-formatted memory stick.

Is there a way to play wbfs files off of a FAT formatted drive now?

@wardrich: Yes you can play wii game files (wbfs, iso, ciso) off a USB drive or SD card partitioned in either WBFS or FAT32 or NTFS format. All just depends on your preference/choice in formats and software.
It works a treat on a 4.3E with USB Loader GX.
